title: Name, and Avatar:
content:
I was just wondering why you keeners chose your username, avatar, and what it means/symbolizes.

Edit: And your age too (If you don't mind)
[joke]Oh, and social security numbers would be appreciated [/joke]

[hr]

Hi, I'm najawa.

Najawa would be the first 2 letters of my name:

E.G. (Thisex could be 'This is example', Leloro could be 'Level Lord Rocks')

My first name is NAthan
My Middle name is JAmes
And My last name is WAy too confidential for mential whimps like you!!!

I choose my avatar, because... Tough Guy's really do Wear Pink.

[hr]

Now... what about the rest of you guys???

I'm really interested in Xtra, Spleen, and Retodon8's explinations (if they are kind enough to state them).

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Name, and Avatar:
content:
Name: Galaxieretter

Reason: Because Commander Keen is the Galaxieretter. (It's true)


Avatar: Bleegd the friendly garg.

Reason: He is one of my original characters. I drew him in that pose one day at school. Thought he looked cute. Scanned it. Colored it. Resized it. Made it my avatar. I liked the color better then the Yorp one. And no it's not because it is more "teethy." :P

title: Definitions:
content:
Well, What does Galaxieretter mean then?

BTW - The spleen is the part of the body which creates, and destroys blood cells. And, is not nesccessary to live ([joke]We don't need Spleen [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] [/joke])

My question is why did you choose that name.

BTW - Age, how old are you?

-- NAJAWA --

title: Infinitions.
content:
At the time, I was in the habit of randomly yelling 'SPLEEN!' at people, basically because it was an amusing word, which caught on for a while. Then for a few months I spent alot of time inside and soon started searching the Web for Keen stuff, which obviously proved fruitful.

I had a vague idea that the spleen correlated with a chakra, and had something to do with humour and such, and since it was such an easy pun I used it as my username.

As it turns out, the Spleen/Sacral chakra is the centre for creativity, intuition and general amusement, and is attributed to the colour orange, which I had been obsessed with for several years, to the point of purchasing a tracksuit composed of varying shades of yellow and orange (I intend to recreate this outfit someday, instead in the form of a suit--haven't found the necessary components in an Op-Shop yet, though).

As for the avatar, I used it simply because it represented the mod I had begun work on (and still am working on), and I haven't really found the need to change it yet.

My age is 21 and 11 days.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

The development of the hardware, and the greater ability to express every idea that flies into a programmers head, mean that game creators have made the new games congested with every technique in their power. The basic games behind all this are so blurred that people cant catch up. We should go back to basics like Pac-Man and play in an easier, more relaxed way. -Toru Iwatani

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: The stupid story of Spikenexus...
content:
My old username is Nospike88 - a gargishly unimaginative name. Just a Keen 6 enemy with an 88 stuck on the end with some stupid logic that somehow was supposed to say that Keen 1 was my favourite Keen game at the time. (In 1988 I was 1. And my favourite Keen was Keen 1... Gah) I had that name from September 2001 until May 2004.

SpikeNexus is only yorpishly unimaginative - I saw the word Nexus somewhere and enjoyed how it looked. I'm not sure why Spike was included... probably something to do with 'Nospike88'

My avatar is some sinister Nospike from the rough neighbourhoods of Fribbulus Xax.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Name & avatar
content:
Hey LL, did you notice najawa thinks you rock?

I'll give you the short version, as the long version can be found on my website:

One of the weapons in Duke Nukem 3D is called the Devastator.
To illustrate, he is an [img]http://www.bur.st/~duke3d/dev/devcon3c.jpg[/img] of a completely unrelated piece of weaponry, because I can't seem to find a good one of the Devastator..

The weapon looked cool, the name sounded cool, so I figured I'd borrow it.
Then again, carbon copying seemed less cool, so I chose something sounding somewhat close; Detonator.
I thought using numbers instead of letters was cool back then (to a much lesser degree now), so I spelled it: "Deton8or".
It seemed a bit aggressive on IRC and the like, so I just jumbled around the letters, ended up with "Retodon8" eventually, which didn't make sense, but at least was pretty much unique.
It stuck.

The avatar comes from my astrological sign, both Western and Chinese.
I don't believe in astrology, but I figured sheep were cool, especially the kind with (seemingly) 4 horns, and less popular than the other, really cool animals other people used as their avatars, so I picked it.
Over time I only discovered more (far fetched) evidence those were the right picks for me.

Edit: Oh, I'm from 1979.Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: hehe
content:
My legally given name is Xkylyr Rauh. Xkylyr is said like Skyler, and Rauh rhymes with Cow... Since people named Skyler go by Sky for short, I figured Xky was acceptable as short for Xkylyr. 2001 is the year I graduated from high school... I used XkyRauh2001 as my primary online identity from about 1999 to 2003, when I finally dropped the 2001. Now I just go by XkyRauh.

Sometimes I'll use XkyDiver, because it's silly and I like it. :-)

[Edit: I'm 22, and my birthday is March 24, 1983. In 2006 I'll turn 23!]

Xtraverse, I find it amusing that originally your name was ex-Traverse, as opposed to Extra-Verse... the emphasis is ever so slightly offset![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]

title: Re: Name, and Avatar:
content:
I had gotten confused between a Flect and a Fleex (I was more fond of the Flect at the time although I thought its name was 'Fleex'), as I hadn't "owned" Keen 6 for very long at the time, and 'UnFleexable' is basically a terrible pun on the word 'unflexible'.

As Ezboard was being a real bitch to me at the time, I had unintentionally created various accounts as Ezboard wouldn't send me a validation email. It wasn't until I tried a new email address that Ezboard validated my account and by then, my username was '0 UNFLEEXABLE 0'.

Fascinating, ain't it? Oh, and don't ask how I got confused between the two monsters though. I was one sad, ignorant child.-- Censorship is F**ked! --
